title: Watering Can
desc:
Post 2431
- Set all <:sprout:1118917438893985802> cards in your hand to their <:green:1106234108042031166> stage, as if they were in your hand for exactly 3 turns.
- If you don't have a <:sprout:1118917438893985802> card, draw a **Phantom** <:sprout:1118917438893985802> card and then apply the above effect.
